website_summaries.verdict: This electromagnetic lock provides buyers with ample home security from a reliable company.
pros: Can be wired to a switch and controlled with a remote for simple managing
Great price for a top-quality product
cons: Must be placed directly on door
Product can get a little warm

customer_reviews.title: Nice lock
customer_reviews.text: Great lock for the price. Not easy to install if your not familiar with them but I’ve installed many and this works good.
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: Works well & as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Good design and works well. We've noted it gets a bit warm, but no so much as to suggest an "issue." (We're using it on 12V.) Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonRick

customer_reviews.title: Secondary lock works really well
customer_reviews.text: Wired this mag loc into system because wood door was a little weak at bottom. Installation was a snap and smaller profile of 600 lb unit made it less obtrusive.
customer_reviews.author: Paolo Scagliarini

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product on a hidden door I installed in my new movie room! I wired it to a switch and it works great! Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.author: jasonb501

customer_reviews.title: great item!
customer_reviews.text: Great item, price point is perfect. Other manufactures offer the same holding power but charge a lot more.I would say this is a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Decent and easy enough to use electromagnetic
customer_reviews.text: Decent and easy enough to use electromagnetic. It can be easily twisted and circumvented if it's not being used directly on a door. I've had multiple people twist this magnet off and bypass it.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Green

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Our previous mag lock lasted 5 years, so I replaced it with the exact same model to make for an easy install. The price was cheap which is important. It's been about 4 months since I installed it and it still works.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Easy, straightforward install. All of the mounting hardware is included, be sure you have a hammer for installing the guide pins in the plate that goes on the door. Excellent holding force as well. A much easier solution than electric strikes for access control systems!
customer_reviews.author: Nick H.

customer_reviews.title: USELESS
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy these!!! Suppose to produce 600 pounds of holding force. I could pull it apart with two fingers. Trying to return for refund, but customer service is awful. Will keep fighting.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: I am still connecting the lock. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Cox Delmer

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed as the product does seem very well made
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use on my automatic gate, however was not able to use. Once I opened the packaging to install, a note was included that declared it for Inside Use Only. I was disappointed as the product does seem very well made. For the right application, this seems like a great product. Unfortunately for me, not what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Troy J.

customer_reviews.title: Now my church's office is secure
customer_reviews.text: This unit works perfect. Now my church's office is secure
customer_reviews.author: oblin  nicolas

customer_reviews.title: Bad information ...
customer_reviews.text: The included mounting template has no dimensions. (Yes, I know they suggest you simply hold it up to the door). I called the manufacturer ... they gave a completely different set of dimensions for the space between the holes. No mechanical drawings available ... just the poor mounting template.
customer_reviews.author: Don Y

product_meta.title: Seco-Larm E-941SA-600 Enforcer Electromagnetic Lock with 600 Pound Holding Force
product_meta.description: Size:One PackPrevent unauthorized visitors from gaining entry to your home or business. This electromagnetic lock (mag-lock) mounts to your point of entry, keeping your door securely closed, with 600 pounds of holding force, until you release the powerful magnet manua
feature_bullets: 12VDC or 24VDC power keeps heavy-duty magnetic lock closed
Manually release lock through a security system or remote control

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars30 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
